body.name: YOUKOYI LED Desk Lamp with Clock, Kids Desk Lamp, 10W Dimmable Study Lamp with Pen Holder, 4 Lighting Modes&5 Brightness Level with Color Changing Nightlight, Desk Lamps for Home Office, Gift for Kids
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 12 mins

features: 【Multi-function Desk Lamp】This children desk lamp with a pen holder allows you to place stationery, small items, etc., making your desktop more neat and saving space on your desk! Perfect for children's study desks and anyone who needs a functional and tidy workspace! It is absolutely a must-have item for workspaces, homes, workstations, shared rooms, or dorm rooms for students.

【Multiple Lighting Modes】The desk lamp offers 4 lighting modes: white/natural/warm white/cool white, and 5 brightness levels for each mode. The desk light with a sensitive touch control function that even children can easily set up different lighting modes to coordinate with the different need. This kids desk lamp is a great choice for studying, reading, or working.

【RGB Night Light & Clock】This table lamp with a RGB colorful night light. You can just press the button to change the color you like. The night light feature creates a soothing and relaxing atmosphere in the room. At the same time this lamp with a digital clock can also be used as a daily wake-up alarm clock. Start your day with a good wake up! This lamp is dorm room essentials for students!

【Adjustable Gooseneck Lamp & USB Powered】This LED desk lamp features a flexible gooseneck design that can be easily adjusted to the perfect angle for your workspace. Plus, the study lamp come with USB cable and an adapter. You could supply the power to the kids desk lamp through adapters, power banks, computers, and other ways.

【Time Management & Eye-caring】Desk lamp for kids comes equipped with a countdown timer with various time effects, designed to encourage time management skills and improve learning efficiency. The lamp's translucent panel and high-quality LED beads emit soft light without glare or flicker, helping to protect your eyes. Ideal for children's study and workspaces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy Your Reading Time YOUKOYI is committed to designing more convenient desk lamp. This study desk lamp has not only elegant appearance, but also combines lighting, pen holder, digital clock, alarm clock, 90 to 5 mins countdown function and colorful night light. More saving your desk space and makes it neat and tidy.
Previous page Next page 1 Wide Application 2 RGB Night Light 3 Alarm Clock 4 Eye-Caring Lamp 5 Instructions

Time to Studying This desk lamp is more than just a source of light - it comes equipped with a clock and countdown timer, various time effects can help you control time accurately, improve learning efficiency, and also play the role of a memo. Unique design makes it an absolute must-have for reading and studying. Time to Sleeping In addition to its practical features, stylish appearance that complements room decor. Its RGB night light function creates a beautiful and romantic atmosphere, helping you fall asleep and improve sleep quality. It also doubles as a daily wake-up alarm clock to help you start your day afresh.
Suitable for home, office, study room, reading room, dorm room. Ideal gift for kids, family, friends.

How to set the digital clock? 1. Long press the "clock" key of bottom to enter setting mode. 2. Press the "+" and "-" key to select. 3. Click "clock" key again to confirm the time setting. The clock has 12h/24h time modes. How to set the alarm clock? Is it possible to change the sound and song of the alarm clock? 1. Long press "alarm " key of bottom to enter setting. 2. Press "+" and "-" key to select. 3. Click "alarm " key again to confirm the time and enter next step. 4. Adjust the sound and song. （if you need to quit the alarm function, click “alarm” key） How to set the countdown timer and adjust the display brightness? 1. Countdown function: Click "timer" key to start the countdown function, click to change 05-10-15-20-25-30-45-60-90 mins in sequence. Long press to quit the timer. 2. Display brightness: Just click "clock" key to adjust the display brightness. Does this study lamp have brightness memory function? The study lamp has brightness memory function, it will memorize your current brightness, lighting mode and color of base when turning off the light. (if you cut off the power supply instead of turning off the switch, it will release all settings.) Does this desk lamp come with an adapter? The desk lamp come with an adapter, power cord, instruction manual, and button description card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this lamp. Modern looking and very easy to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very colorful and bright. Affordable, and well made. Easy type c charging cord. The best feature is the bendable light arm, so you can direct anywhere needed. And the colors are cute but can be changed to natural. Greta for price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is great! It is just as described and it arrived in time. It's been a great assessory to my son's work area. He loves it! It provides a bright light for him to work on projects or homework l, the alarm works well, and the lamp is very easy to use. I would recommend getting this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 7 year old granddaughter absolutely loves her lamp especially the color changing options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a functional and stylish lamp for kids & teens
reviews.reviewText: I received the LED desk lamp for free, and I must say, my son uses this lamp daily. The lamp is being used by my son on his desk, and it is proving to be incredibly helpful. The four lighting modes allow my son to choose the right brightness according to his needs, and the clock feature is an added bonus, especially for students who need to manage their time efficiently.What I love most about this lamp is its compact design, which not only saves desk space but also looks great. The writing implement storage is a practical feature, and it keeps my son's desk organized. The lamp is easy to use, and the touch control makes it convenient to switch between modes.In terms of quality, the LED desk lamp is made with durable materials, and I have no doubt that it will last for a long time. The light it produces is bright and consistent, and it doesn't produce any flickers. My son is using the lamp daily, and it has made a significant difference in the ambiance of his workspace.Overall, I would highly recommend the LED desk lamp to anyone looking for a functional and stylish lamp for their desk. It is an excellent investment that provides value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive lamp with nice features
reviews.reviewText: Wanted something fun to light up my boring work desk and this did the job! It has nice clean lines and is attractive looking. I enjoy changing the colors on the clock for fun. The brightness of the lamp can be adjusted with a simple tap of the button as well. The base has decent storage space for pens/pencils. The height may be a little short for some desks depending how much much space you need illuminated (mine does not clear the top of my computer screen). Might work even better as a bedside reading lamp. Just know that it is not wireless and plugs in with a usb attachment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome desk lamp with lots of features.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this desk lamp and have been extremely impressed with its multifunctional design. It comes with a digital clock, countdown timer, color-changing night light, and pen holder, which is perfect for my needs.The lamp also offers 4 lighting modes and 5 brightness levels, so I can easily adjust it to suit my different tasks. I love the touch control function - it's so convenient and easy to use. The night light is also a great feature - it's soothing and can help me relax before bed. Plus, the alarm clock function is a nice touch. (the controls are on the bottom)One of the standout features of this lamp is the gooseneck design. It's so flexible and easy to adjust, and I love that I can direct the light wherever I want it. The lamp is also USB powered, which is great because it's convenient and easy to use. Plus, the lamp comes with the adapter, which is a nice touch since you don't have to supply your own or use one you already have.It's the perfect addition to my workspace, and I love the multifunctional design. The lamp is well-made and provides plenty of light, and the color-changing night light is a nice touch.Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend this desk lamp to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love hate relationship
reviews.reviewText: I have a love hate relationship with this. Love the different light settings, the colors around the time, and pencil holder. Hate that if you accidentally press the wrong button, timer sets and alarm will go off at the end of whatever time is set. Not sure how to disable it. Not very user friendly.
Luz agradable, la sintonia de la alarma es muy chula, el reloj se ve muy bien, alumbra un montón, se puede regular el color y la intensidad de la luz. Fácil e intuitiva de usar.

Sehr coole Lampe. War erst etwas skeptisch, aber wurde eines anderen belehrt. Lichthelligkeit und Lichtfarbe können separat eingestellt werden, was ich sehr praktisch finde. Zusätzlich gibt es noch ein buntes Licht um die Digitaluhr was natürlich sehr toll für Kinder ist und jeden Abend als nächtliche dient 👍🏻Stifte finden auch genug Platz um im der Lampe verräumt zu werden. Das Material erscheint mir robust, denn unsere kleine Tochter 3 wackelt schon ab und zu ordentlich an der Lampe herum 😅
A mia figlia e'piaciuto tanto..e completo di tante funzioni tutte utili... per la notte e fenomenale con la scelta delle luci colorate con la funzione del timer di spegnimento..

Lampe heute erhalten und getestet. Das Licht ist ausreichend hell, der Rest ist ok.Was direkt auffällt:- das Licht fimmert auf den hellsten Stufen echt stark! Hatte so einen Verdacht und habe das mitgeliefte USB-Netzteil mal gegen ein besserer getauscht. Siehe da, das Flimmern ist weg! Das Netzteil ist also mit dem Strombezug auf den helleren Stufen schlicht überfordert. Da ich genügend Netzteile habe stört micht das nicht soooo sehr. Sollte aber eigentlich so sein!- Das bunte Nachtlicht läßt sich auch ganz abschalten! Das war mir wichtig (Die Info fehlte mit in der Beschreibung / den Bewertungen) Die Uhr leuchtet aber immer ein wenig.
haben die Lampe als geschenk gekauft das kind hat sich mega gefreut .und hat eine super qualität kann man mit guten gewissen weiterempfehlen
